nodes.text: A crisis began on Moltok when a Makurth boss shot at a Ho'Din settlement. This lead the Ho'Din to request Imperial support to prevent the crisis from becoming a full-fledged war. At the time of the crisis the Gozanti-class cruiser Blood Crow was assisting the freighter Dromedar when it was requested to help settle the matter. While members of the Blood Crow's crew stayed behind to fix the Dromedar, the Blood Crow jumped into hyperspace.
